Intro to shiny.semantic

Appsilon

2020-08-20

Source: vignettes/intro.Rmd
intro.Rmd

This is how you generate your first UI with shiny.semantic:

uirender(uiinput(icon("dog"),
        numeric_input("input", value = 0, label = "")
), width = "200px", height = "100px")
